title: Pixel 3 won't turn on or charge, only black screen. Any thoughts on potential problem?
content: I've confirmed that the outlet is supplying power, I've used several different cords including the one that came with the phone, I've tried holding power and down-volume for 30 sec, I've tried plugging phone into computer, phone seems to be unable to charge, its completely unresponsive.  Any thoughts on other things to try?
